name: Happiness predictors – World Happiness Report (2017)
title: Happiness predictors – World Happiness Report (2017)
description: The variables have been dated 2017 in our dataset, in order to be consistent with the date of publication. However, the underlying data comes from various survey waves, varying by country. The online appendix in the original article provides details regarding actual dates of data collection.
